name: Black Patch
movement: swimming speed of 40 feet, immobile on land
description: The Black Patch is a large, amorphous ooze that can easily traverse through water, having a viscous, dark appearance typical of an ooze.
memorable: Its ability to mesmerize foes and the danger posed by its Viscid Suffocation attack make it a unique threat in battle.
goals: To engage and ensnare creatures in aquatic settings, draining them of life with its acid.
relations: It may share environments with other aquatic creatures and typically functions alone.
environment: Usually found in aquatic environments, capable of ambushing unsuspecting creatures in water.
strengths: Resilient to damage with high hit points, it can mesmerize and control adversaries, making it a formidable opponent.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to attacks, and its passive perception is below average.
attacks: Uses pseudopods to attack, dealing both bludgeoning and acid damage, with the potential to attach to and suffocate opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Eldritch Luminance, which can mesmerize foes, forcing them to move toward it.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
skills: Has a passive perception score of 8, indicating its average sensing capabilities.
additional_information: Can breathe air and water due to its Amphibious ability.
Capable of entering spaces occupied by hostile creatures, giving it strategic positioning.
Does not require sleep, remaining active constantly.
Immunity to several conditions including being blinded, charmed, and poisoned.
Adventure parties may be tempted to engage it, unaware of its mesmerizing abilities.
